abstract: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei issues sharp rebuke to letter from Republican lawmakers that sought to cast doubt on durability of any nuclear deal under future presidents; reaffirms support for negotiations, but says letter is evidence of decline in political ethics in Washington and disintegration of American establishment.
lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said the letter was “a sign of a decline in political ethics and the destruction of the American establishment from within.”

headline.main: G.O.P. Letter by Republican Senators Is Evidence of ‘Decline,’ Iranian Says
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Letter Is Evidence of ‘Decline,’ Iranian Says

snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, Iran’s supreme leader, said the letter was “a sign of a decline in political ethics and the destruction of the American establishment from within.”
